newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: BARLOW SELLS LOCAL GROUP KELVINATOR BRAND.
newsitem.headline: BARLOW SELLS LOCAL GROUP KELVINATOR BRAND.

text.p: Barlow Ltd on Tuesday announced it had sold its domestic appliances brand Kelvinator to a group of local businessmen.
The new company will be known as Kelvinator of South Africa (Pty) Ltd. Terry Rolfe will be chairman and Simon Koch managing director.
The company has allocated 20 percent of its shareholding to a labour-based empowerment group and another 20 percent to its own employees.
Speaking at the relaunching of the brand, Koch said that the company was restructuring its operations to compete in a changing business environment.
He said the company would focus on increasing its market share and reinforcing Kelvinator as the preferred domestic appliance in South Africa.
